item.title: On a rock somewhere
item.description: I am on a rock somewhere, it’s the only one I know, but I know it well. - Jacob Collier It sometimes completely blows my mind when I try to think of the scale of the universe. The famous image of earth called “The Pale blue dot” taken of voyager 1 from beyond the saturn, first gave me a glimpse of how tiny we are. Then there are images from hubble and JWST, so astonishing that they force you to think about enormity of the known universe.
